title: [BUG] SKXamlCanvas reports only half for ActualWidth and ActualHeight on iOs
body:
**Description**
If I draw something using the ActualWidth and ActualHeight of the SKXamlCanvas on iOs, it reports half of the size the canvas actually is. If e.g. I draw a rectangle like this:

``
e.Surface.Canvas.DrawRect(new SKRect(0, 0, (float)ActualWidth, (float)ActualHeight), new SKPaint(SKColors.Red) });
``

it only occupies one quarter of the whole canvas. I'm not sure if there is any Scaling factor in place or some DPI-issue. It might be related to [this](https://github.com/unoplatform/uno/issues/7255) issue, where the underlying Bitmap is also rendered smaller on iOs and Android then it should be.

Is there any scaling/DPI-setup happening in SkiaSharp?

I may provide a sample if necessary - just running out of time for the moment.

**Expected Behavior**
The ActualSize is correct
<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**
The ActualSize is reported wrong.
